title: The Shakers: Hands to Work, Hearts to God
occurrences: THE WORLD CALLED THEM "SHAKERS."
THE SHAKERS WERE PRACTICING
THE SHAKERS WERE CELIBATE.
TODAY, LESS THAN A DOZEN SHAKERS
THESE ARE THE LAST SHAKERS.
SO MY FATHER EVENTUALLY HEARD OF THE SHAKERS IN MAINE
Narrator: THE SHAKERS BELIEVED THAT IDEAS COULD TAKE FORM
I THINK YOU HAVE TO SEE THE SHAKERS WITH THEIR ARTIFACTS
AS SHAKING QUAKERS, OR "SHAKERS."
"WE ARE THE PEOPLE," CLAIMED THE SHAKERS
WELL, I CAME TO THE SHAKERS AS A CHILD, SEVEN YEARS OLD
"THEY SAID THE SHAKERS
"'GO TO THE SHAKERS.
"ARE THE SO-CALLED SHAKERS.
I WAS TOLD THAT THE SHAKERS WERE AT WORSHIP."
Narrator: THE SHAKERS BELIEVED
THE ENERGY OF THE SHAKERS AS I SEE IT
BUT FOR THE SHAKERS
WE WOULDN'T HAVE ANY SHAKERS.
THE SHAKERS BROUGHT THEIR MISSION TO THE FRONTIER
THE RIVER CONNECTED THE SHAKERS TO MARKETS
THE SHAKERS BUILT A SECOND, IDENTICAL LIMESTONE BUILDING.
THE WESTERN SHAKERS HAD
THEY WERE THE FIRST SHAKERS TO BIND BOOKS.
BUT INDIANA WAS THE FARTHEST WEST THE SHAKERS GOT.
Narrator: WORK WAS WORSHIP WITH THE SHAKERS-- AN ACT OF PIETY.
Narrator: THE SHAKERS WERE FARMERS AND CARPENTERS
WHEN THE SHAKERS BEGAN SELLING GARDEN SEED
YOU SEE, THE SHAKERS, BEING INVENTORS IN THEIR OWN RIGHT
THE SHAKERS NEVER SAW ANY SENSE IN FIGHTING AGAINST GRAVITY.
Narrator: AT ONE TIME, THE SHAKERS AT CANTERBURY DISCOVERED
Woman: "WE PLANT SOME FOR THE SHAKERS
THAT THEY WERE THINKING OF JOINING THE SHAKERS.
AND THE SHAKERS KNEW THIS PERFECTLY WELL
AND THEY LABELED THEM "WINTER SHAKERS"
Man: "IN THE SHAKERS, I FIND ONE PEACE OF BELIEF
"TO SAY THAT WE ARE INDEBTED TO THE SHAKERS
THE SHAKERS WERE THE OLDEST AND STILL SEEMED THE SOUNDEST.
Narrator: THE WORLD WHICH HAD FINALLY ACCEPTED THE SHAKERS
Narrator: BY THE 1840s, A WHOLE GENERATION OF SHAKERS
THE SPIRITS OF DEPARTED SHAKERS AND OTHERS--
THE SHAKERS TOOK IN ORPHANS, THE CHILDREN OF ADULT CONVERTS
Narrator: THE CIVIL WAR TESTED THE SHAKERS' DEDICATION
BUT HE GRANTED THE SHAKERS AN EXEMPTION FROM MILITARY SERVICE
NOT ONLY AMONG SHAKERS, BUT AMONG AMERICAN PROGRESSIVES.
UNDER HER GUIDANCE, SHAKERS HELD A PEACE CONFERENCE
THE SHAKERS COULDN'T COMPETE, EVEN IN THE SIMPLE WAYS
SO THE YOUNG MEN WHO WERE SHAKERS
Narrator: THE 20th-CENTURY SHAKERS GREW FLOWERS, HUNG PICTURES
BUT I HAVE NOT THE LEAST DOUBT THE SHAKERS WILL EVER DIE.
